Option: preview.wwwroot

This option should contain the local file system path to the web servers www root. Notice this path can be relative or absolute and if this option is left blank MCFileManager will then try to figure out the wwwroot.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['preview.wwwroot'] = "/www/something";

Example of usage of realpath in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['preview.wwwroot'] = "../";

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

preview.wwwroot=/www/something
